yeduwen piliwela isinarada, swarayen gananin athi thalada wannama asadrusha ye gahaka wannama[sanskaranaya] tha na tham dana tham dana thamda	na na- the yi thana thamdana thamdana thamda	na na sa k bambaa isuru ewiskam karana	ma sa k ginnan winawaya gena sa	ma sa k	withi rajahata isurindu kala me	ma sa k	nadayen sadi gahaka wanna	ma thuranga wannama[sanskaranaya] thath thath thanan thanena, nath thath thanan thanena thath thath thanan thanena thana - thana thanena thana thanena thanenath thanath tham danath thamdanana - sath weth mahath adara, lath yuth sidath kumaru gath sith thosath pawidi anga - anakarana channayena, kanthakaya asu genena, gena eduna asuge pita nan	ga gath gath payak asuge, sabdath wasath surindu yanneth thosin thidena samaga - yana yanena kala thidena ethana thana pasuwa dana, gantherata path wuniya ema	ga lath lath sithath thidena, weth weth ekath pasawa muth kanathkath weyi thuraga - siduhathun gena wahana, wanna waligaya athina panneth ethera anoma gan ga goth sith mahath rusiru, lath yuth thedath kumaru, gen seth ragath naritha anga - thidena pana giye gagina etheda ana gena bathina, yeduwa nana warnanayena thura ga 37.
ema sisuwa wisin wijedasage paharaganima danum nodennata mema siddhiya sadakalika abhirahasak wannata thibini.
